suites.title: Registration and Authorization
suites.description: Test cases for registration and authorization

cases.title: The registration via invalid login (empty) and valid password
cases.description: The registration via invalid login (empty) and valid password on the demoshopping.ru
cases.preconditions: The user is not registered

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened
The registration window was opened

The error message "The username must contain 3 to 15 characters and can include letters, numbers, and symbols: _. The password must be at least 8 characters long, including at least one letter and one number" was displayed

steps.action: Input valid password from test data
steps.expected_result: The password was displayed without error message. The 'Register' button was inactive.
steps.data: 8 symbols with 1 english letter and 7 number

tags: G9-26 Регистрация пользователя / User Registration

cases.title: The registration by registered user
cases.description: The registration by already registered user on the demoshopping.ru
cases.preconditions: The user is registered with login LENALENA and password LENALEN1

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened
The registration window was opened

steps.action: Input valid login from test data
steps.expected_result: The login was displayed without error message

steps.action: Input valid password from test data
steps.expected_result: The password was displayed without error message. All validations are OK
The user was not registered. The error message "This user already exists" was displayed.

tags: G9-26 Регистрация пользователя / User Registration

cases.title: The authorization via existing login and incorrect password
cases.description: The authorization via existing login and incorrect password on the demoshopping.ru
cases.preconditions:
1. Check there is not any user with login LENALENA, password - LENALEN2
2. Register the user with login LENALENA, password - LENALEN1

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened
The authorization window was opened

steps.action: Input existing login from test data
steps.expected_result: The login was displayed without error message

steps.action: Input incorrect password from test data
steps.expected_result: The password was displayed without error message. All validations are OK
steps.data: 8 symbols with 7 english letter and 1 number (password - LENALEN2)

steps.expected_result: The error message "Incorrect username or password" was displayed.

tags: G9-27 Вход в систему / User Login

cases.title: The registration via valid login and invalid password (empty)
cases.description: The registration via valid login and invalid password (empty) on the demoshopping.ru
cases.preconditions: The user is not registered

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened
The registration window was opened

steps.action: Input valid login from test data
steps.expected_result: The login was displayed without error message.

The error message "The username must contain 3 to 15 characters and can include letters, numbers, and symbols: _. The password must be at least 8 characters long, including at least one letter and one number" was displayed. The 'Register' button was inactive.

tags: G9-26 Регистрация пользователя / User Registration

cases.title: The registration via valid login (_) and valid password
cases.description: The registration via valid login (symbol \_) and valid password on the demoshopping.ru
cases.preconditions: The user is not registered

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened
The registration window was opened

steps.action: Input valid login from test data
steps.expected_result: The login was displayed without error message

steps.action: Input valid password from test data
steps.expected_result: The password was displayed without error message. All validations are OK
steps.data: 8 symbols with 1 english letter and 7 number

steps.expected_result: The user was registered. The button "Войти" was changed to "Выйти".
The user was logged out. The button "Выйти" was changed to "Войти".

steps.action: Try to log in with user credentials
steps.expected_result: The user was logged in without error messages

cases.title: The logout of authorized user
cases.description: The logout of authorized user on the demoshopping.ru
cases.preconditions:
1. The user is registered (login - LENALENA, password - LENALEN1)
2. The user is authorized

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened
The user was logged out of the system. The system was reverted to an unauthorized state, and the user was redirected to the login page or the homepage.

tags: G-28 Выход из системы / User Logout

steps.action: Input existing password from test data
steps.expected_result: The password was displayed without error message. All validations are OK

steps.expected_result: The error message "Incorrect username or password" was displayed.

cases.title: Sorting the product list by name (from Z to A)
cases.description: Sorting the product list by name (from Z to A) in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different first letters of product names (e.g. Apple Fit, Samsung Note, Xiaomi New)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Choose to sort products by name (from Z to A)
steps.expected_result: The product list is updated according to the chosen sort order

tags: G9-10 Сортировка списка товаров / Sorting the product list

cases.title: Viewing the product list and product details
cases.description: Viewing the product list and product details in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 15 products in the catalog with all information to each product - image, title, description, price, category, manufacturer, and free shipping information.

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened. The list of products with 2 pages of products (15 product cards in total) was displayed.

steps.action: Compare the List of products layout with the mockup
steps.expected_result: Each product card was displayed with image, title, description, price, category, manufacturer, and free shipping information.

tags: G9-9 Просмотр списка товаров и деталей продукта / Viewing the product list and product details

cases.title: Navigating through product list pages using pagination
cases.description: Navigating through product list pages using pagination in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 15 different products in the catalog

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened. The first page of the catalog with 6 product cards was displayed.
The second page of the catalog with 6 product cards was displayed.
The third page of the catalog with last 3 product cards was displayed.

tags: G9-9 Просмотр списка товаров и деталей продукта / Viewing the product list and product details

cases.title: Sorting the product list by name (from A to Z)
cases.description: Sorting the product list by name (from A to Z) in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different first letters of product names (e.g. Apple Fit, Samsung Note, Xiaomi New)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Choose to sort products by name (from A to Z)
steps.expected_result: The product list is updated according to the chosen sort order

tags: G9-10 Сортировка списка товаров / Sorting the product list

cases.title: Sorting the product list by by price (from high to low)
cases.description: Sorting the product list by by price (from high to low) in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different prices (e.g. 1477,00; 1200,00; 1500,00)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Choose to sort products by price (from high to low)
steps.expected_result: The product list is updated according to the chosen sort order

tags: G9-10 Сортировка списка товаров / Sorting the product list

cases.title: Filtering the product list by maximal price
cases.description: Filtering the product list by maximal price in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different prices (e.g. 1500,00; 1711,00; 1440,99)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Input numbers more than 0 in the field Maximal price
steps.expected_result: the 1500,00 was displayed in the field Maximal price
The product list was updated according to the price lower than the filter value. 2 products with prices 1500,00 and 1440,99 were displayed.

tags: G9-11 Фильтрация списка товаров / Filtering the product list

cases.title: Sorting the product list by by price (from low to high)
cases.description: Sorting the product list by by price (from low to high) in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different prices (e.g. 1477,00; 1200,00; 1500,00)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Choose to sort products by price (from low to high)
steps.expected_result: The product list is updated according to the chosen sort order

tags: G9-10 Сортировка списка товаров / Sorting the product list

cases.title: Filtering the product list by Free shipping
cases.description: Filtering the product list by Free Shippinng in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 2 different products in the catalog (one with free shipping, second without free shipping)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Put the tick to the checkbox Free shipping
steps.expected_result: The tick was displayed in the checkbox Free shipping
The product list was updated according to the chosen filter. 1 product with Free shipping was displayed.

steps.action: Remove the tick from the checkbox Free shipping
steps.expected_result: The tick was removed in the checkbox Free shipping
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. All products were displayed

tags: G9-11 Фильтрация списка товаров / Filtering the product list

cases.title: Filtering the product list by minimal price
cases.description: Filtering the product list by minimal price in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different prices (e.g. 1500,00; 1711,00; 1440,99)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Input numbers more than 0 in the field Minimal price
steps.expected_result: the 1500,00 was displayed in the field Minimal price
The product list was updated according to the price higher than the filter value. 2 products with prices 1500,00 and 1711,00 were displayed.

tags: G9-11 Фильтрация списка товаров / Filtering the product list

cases.title: Filtering the product list by Category
cases.description: Filtering the product list by category in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 3 different products in the catalog with different categories (e.g. laptop, phone, watch)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Laptops in the filter Category
steps.expected_result: The Laptops was displayed in the field Category
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with category Laptops was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Phones in the filter Category
steps.expected_result: The Phones was displayed in the field Category
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with category Phones was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Watches in the filter Category
steps.expected_result: The Watches was displayed in the field Category
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with category Watches was displayed.

tags: G9-11 Фильтрация списка товаров / Filtering the product list

cases.title: Filtering the product list by Manufacturer
cases.description: Filtering the product list by manufacturer in the product catalog
cases.preconditions: Create 4 different products in the catalog with different manufacturers (Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, Huawei)

steps.expected_result: The main page was opened with 3 product cards was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Samsung in the filter Manufacturer
steps.expected_result: The Samsung was displayed in the field Manufacturer
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with manufacturer Samsung was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Apple in the filter Manufacturer
steps.expected_result: The Apple was displayed in the field Manufacturer
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with manufacturer Apple was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Xiaomi in the filter Manufacturer
steps.expected_result: The Xiaomi was displayed in the field Manufacturer
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with manufacturer Xiaomi was displayed.

steps.action: Choose Huawei in the filter Manufacturer
steps.expected_result: The Huawei was displayed in the field Manufacturer
The product list was updated according to the chosen category. 1 product with manufacturer Huawei was displayed.

tags: G9-11 Фильтрация списка товаров / Filtering the product list
